title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 20.53 - Producer-handler price differential
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 20.53 - Producer-handler price differential

State Regulations

For skim milk and butterfat received from a handler who
is a producer-handler under this or any other order and is assigned to Class
I-A pursuant to section
20.45
(a)(7)(iii)
of this Part, the transferee handler shall pay a differential equal to the
difference between the Class I-A price and the Class III price both
appropriately adjusted for differentials pursuant to section
20.52
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
20.53

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
